  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>4614</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="no">Build electrical circuits</string>
            <string language="en">Build electrical circuits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrische Stromkreise des Baus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Circuits électriques de construction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Circuitos elétricos da configuração</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Circuiti elettrici di configurazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χτίστε τα ηλεκτρικά κυκλώματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Circuitos eléctricos de la estructura</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">With batteries, bulbs, conducting wires and a switch you can build different parallel and serial circuits.</string>
            <string language="en">With batteries, bulbs, conducting wires and a switch you can build different parallel and serial circuits.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">electrical circuit</string>
            <string language="en">electrical circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">battery</string>
            <string language="en">battery</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">parallel circuit</string>
            <string language="en">parallel circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">serial circuit</string>
            <string language="en">serial circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mit Batterien, Birnen, Leitleitungen und einem 
Schalter können Sie unterschiedliche parallele und Serienstromkreise 
aufbauen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Avec des batteries, des ampoules, des fils de 
conduite et un commutateur vous pouvez établir différents circuits 
parallèles et séquentiels.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Com baterias, bulbos, fios conduzindo e um 
interruptor você pode construir circuitos paralelos e de série 
diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Con le batterie, le lampadine, i legare di 
condotta e un interruttore potete sviluppare i circuiti paralleli e 
seriali differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Με τις μπαταρίες, τους βολβούς, διευθύνοντας τα 
καλώδια και έναν διακόπτη μπορείτε να χτίσετε τα διαφορετικά 
παράλληλα και τμηματικά κυκλώματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Con las baterías, los bulbos, los alambres que 
conducen y un interruptor usted puede construir diversos circuitos 
paralelos y seriales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrischer Stromkreis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Batterie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">paralleler Stromkreis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Serienstromkreis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">circuit électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">batterie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">circuit parallèle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">circuit séquentiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">circuito elétrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bateria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">circuito paralelo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">circuito de série</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">batteria</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μπαταρία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παράλληλο κύκλωμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τμηματικό κύκλωμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
